comments.body: Agreed! I am 18 now and would love to be able to go and have the experience I wanted when I was so young and now I would actually be able to enjoy it to the fullest! I remember hours of watching people's vlogs of Minecon 2011-2016 and hoping that one day I would be able to go, I remember the day they announced they were only doing Minecraft Live I was devastated xd I speak for hundreds of thousands if not millions when I say that MineCons return would be the biggest gaming event period.
Please end update for minecraft java and bedrock

This is actually really cool! There could even be server specific cosmetics like mob themed hats and glasses to make it feel like a real party! Maybe a character creator item can be unlocked just by participating in Minecon server activities

I literally live in Sweden, the country where Minecraft was created yet it says it's not available in my region. That doesn't make any sense at all, not available in the country it was made in????

I also have the same issue. I live in New Zealand and the cape is also unavailable. The cape is only available in the US. There aren't even any streams that I can watch to earn the cape either. So having the cape in various countries would be good.
This is unfair. TikTok does not allow me to get the cape because the region I live. The cape must no depend on which country you are. Completely disgusting.

Another autistic person, here.

  1. People typically don't like being singled out, so autistic people might not take too kindly to such a pushy acceptance movement.
  2. Autism Speaks is a very controversial organisation. Partnering with them would put Mojang and Microsoft in a lot of PR trouble.

First off, as an autistic person. Hecc autism speaks, they can burn in the nether dimension. Second, he can autism speaks. They stigmatize and shame autism as a thing to cure. We are not racing for a cure. We are not missing a piece, and autism isn't something we have. It's something we are

I have a really good idea for a new mob......... I just came up with it today. It's called the Pooka and it is a shapeshifter that can transform into a rabbit, fox, wolf/dog, or cat. It's a bad mob and can spawn day or night. It's also based of of a mithical creature I just changed it up a tiny bit. Also the shrieking sounds SO cool
I want the new boss mob
I don't think that would be the best idea, if they do it the same way
Some players act like this even with the mob vote. Part of the community becomes toxic due to it, as history has shown. I'd rather they just add those previously suggested mobs over time regardless.

The community will be toxic and mad no matter what they do... But I don't think bringing back the mob vote is a good idea. Its WAY too polarizing, and actively pits the community against each other. There is no time more contentious within the community than the Mob Vote season.

I like the mob vote.
It's a vote that allows us to shape the future of Minecraft.

The real problem was the way the marketing team handled the situation. They didn't know how to deal with the toxic reaction from the community and take measures to redirect that energy.

Fans felt that by voting, they were losing something forever, and Mojang never did anything to effectively correct that feeling.

And in this case, words alone won't work. Action is needed.

As a professor of advertising and marketing, my suggestion is that they pay attention to the creatures (and biomes) that lost the last votes.

A "second chance vote", for example, would be a way to appease the "losers" from previous years and also show that they are paying attention to the community.
We should DEFINETLY add some kind of vote. In previous years we had biome vote etc. I would really like some kind of community element to Minecraft Live, like a mob vote.
bro we haven't even seen what the new mc live format will be and also there's going to be a new community event we don't even know what it is so chill out
Plus they add better content anyway.

Not s1mple as people assume. And they already include mobs outside of the vote, plus other features. The votes are more about participation and hyping attention to the main live event and next upd4te.

The phantom is also in dispute right now, as they are thinking about removing it from the game. So we voted for him for almost nothing? The slow falling potions and repair elytras can also be placed in another way. Who didn't want the Wildfire for example?
The idea in parentheses is the better option. The more the merrier.
